imdb.plot outline: Set against the backdrop of a heated national debate, American Exotic tackles one of the most talked about issues today - exotic pets. Hosted by Tim Harrison and directed by Michael Webber, two of the nation's leading experts in dangerous exotic animals, this in-depth series takes viewers on a fascinating journey deep into the heart of this rarely seen or understood American subculture.
imdb.title: American Exotic
plot: Set against the backdrop of a heated national debate, _American Exotic_ (qv) tackles one of the most talked about issues today - exotic pets. Hosted by Tim Harrison and directed by Michael Webber, two of the nation's leading experts in dangerous exotic animals, this in-depth series takes viewers on a fascinating journey deep into the heart of this rarely seen or understood American subculture.::Anonymous
